text:
I am slowly getting familiar with julia's multi threading system. Except for the Computation Thinking course and a few other stuff(docs etc.) there isn't a great info/example of the capabilities.
I wish to use multithreading(or other parallel methods) to speedup reading and writing into an in-memory data structure. Anything(pacakge, gist, blog)  covering lock/unlock, @async etc. would be really helpful. Thank you. :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text:
